recipesJson.name: Dreamsicle
recipesJson.author: Foment_life
recipesJson.description:
The orange is much more sherbet, and the ice cream is that fluffy kind of thing that works so well on a stick, just like the summer time treat.

Tasty day one, better after a few days when everything has had a few days to get to know each other.

reviews.text: One of the great things about certain flavors is the memory they bring back.  For me, childhood summers always meant creamsicle ice cream, and this recipe replicates the flavor perfectly.  Nice cold sensation and creamy orange, with a light tangerine to really bring it out.  It's perfect for summer, and I'm sure I'll always have a bottle ready to go in the warmer weather.  Really a great job.

Overall, This has been one of my favorite recipes since I've started mixing.  I've went through bottles of it and it's pretty much spot on.  Not sure if it's vapors tongue or the WS-23, but I tend to get immune to the flavor pretty fast.

Since I don't have FA Blood Orange, I got the authors permission to do a 1:1 sub for FW instead. After a day of steeping this is incredible, it does a very nice job on blending those sharp citrus notes into a very pleasant ice cream vape. Immediately had to mix a bigger batch, this is going into my rotation!
Spot on Orange Dreamsicle. Perfect amount of chill and while fantastic as a S&V, give it a day for the Blood Orange to mellow out and it is absolutely perfect.
